DOC.brief_summary: The study plan people would like reduce maintain weight keep healthy life style .After signing informed consent , participant divide randomly two group : control group intervention group get application ( eBalance ) . Participants follow 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: Development Web Application Evaluation Its Impact Healthy Lifestyle
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective : develop web application base energy balance evaluate effectiveness promote healthy lifestyle habit versus control group . Secondary objective : 1 . To evaluate frequency convenient usage internet intervention 2 . To test impact intervention nutrition knowledge , diet quality physical activity 3 . To evaluate effect intervention weight management status
DOC.criteria: People age 18 year Web email experience Interested either reduce weight maintain healthy lifestyle without mail experience pregnancy involvement diet program
